General.Name: Green Plus Co. Ltd
General.Description: Green Plus Co., Ltd. manufactures, processes, and sells aluminum products in South Korea. It is involved in the aluminum extrusion; and design, process, manufacture, construction, wholesale, and retail of aluminum bars, as well as manufacture, process, wholesale, and retail of other non-ferrous metals. The company also constructs greenhouses for botanical gardens, as well as steel structures; and designs and manufactures hi-tech materials for greenhouses. Green Plus Co., Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Yesan-Eup, South Korea.
